intro: Psychotria salmoneiflora, commonly known as the salmon-flowered psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its striking salmon-pink flowers, which are clustered in dense inflorescences. It typically grows as an evergreen shrub, reaching heights of up to 2 meters. The leaves are usually elliptical or ovate, with a glossy surface and a dark green color.
